sentences.sContent: Through Jia Bao-Yu's olfaction and gustation, his spiritual love and facultative desire was emphasized.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through Jia Bao-Yu's olfaction and gustation, his spiritual love and facultative desire was emphasized.
sentences.sCn: 通过賈宝玉的嗅觉与味觉，进入他的深层意識与美感触觉，突显他的精神戀爱与官能欲望。

sentences.sContent: Through Jia Bao-Yu's olfaction and gustation , his spiritual love and facultative desire was emphasized.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through Jia Bao-Yu's olfaction and gustation , his spiritual love and facultative desire was emphasized.
sentences.sCn: 通过宝玉的嗅觉与味觉，进入他的深层意与美感触觉，突显他的精神爱与官能欲望。

remMethod.val: 一阵强风(gust)吹来， 他们没办法在露天茶座惬意地进行美食品尝(gustation)了

trans.tranOther: the act of tasting or the faculty of taste
